zh: 探索设计与技术的边界，
en: Exploring the boundaries of design and technology,

zh: 每一个项目都是一次新的尝试。
en: each project is a new experiment.

zh: 记录品牌在不同阶段中的设计决策与系统演进，关注设计如何在变化中保持一致性与判断力。
en: Documenting design decisions and system evolution across different brand stages, focusing on how design maintains consistency and judgment through change.

zh: 作为商业项目之外的长期视觉实践，这些作品用于探索形式、材料与感知方式，并反向滋养我在品牌与产品设计中的判断力。
en: As a long-term visual practice beyond commercial projects, these works explore form, material, and perception, while enriching my judgment in brand and product design.
"Sparks of inspiration in the friction of pen and paper"
